message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product to you. It is an exceptional piece that has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. Given its unique features and benefits, we believe it is worth $1500000 to you. We are offering it to you today at a special introductory price of $1400000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this opportunity carefully.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this is a fair price, considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your response, Bob. While we understand your perspective, we would like to respectfully suggest a revised price of $1350000 for our product. We believe this offers a fair compromise between our initial asking price and your counteroffer. We hope this aligns better with your expectations while still reflecting the true value and quality of the product.
I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still a bit higher than my budget. I'd like to propose a price of $1100000. I believe this is a fair price, considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. After careful consideration, we are proposing a price of $1250000 for our product. This reflects a midpoint between our original asking price and your most recent counteroffer. We believe this price offers a fair compromise, taking into account both the value of the product and your budget constraints.
I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still a bit higher than my budget. I'd like to propose a price of $1050000. I believe this is a fair price, considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your proposal, Bob. After evaluating your latest offer, we are willing to consider $1150000 as a fair price for our product. This reflects a compromise between our original asking price and your most recent counteroffer. We hope this aligns better with your budget while still recognizing the high value and quality of the product.
I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still a bit higher than my budget. I'd like to propose a price of $1000000. I believe this is a fair price, considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your proposal, Bob. After careful consideration, we are willing to negotiate at $1075000 for our product. This reflects a compromise between our original asking price and your most recent counteroffer. We hope this aligns better with your budget while still recognizing the high value and quality of the product.
I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still a bit higher than my budget. I'd like to propose a price of $950000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
